sentences.en: A non-aggression pact will be signed between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 两国将签署互不侵犯条约。

sentences.en: He says this contract should not be patterned after the Deere pact.
sentences.cn: 他说这个合同不应该模仿《迪尔协定》。

sentences.en: How did you really foresee he'd make a pact with Stalin?
sentences.cn: 你到底是怎么预见他会和斯大林签定条约的?

sentences.en: It was a pact made in fun long ago.
sentences.cn: 这是很久以前在开玩笑时定下的口约.

sentences.en: Last month he signed a new non-aggression pact with Germany.
sentences.cn: 上个月，他与德国签订了新的互不侵犯条约。

sentences.en: Police refused to say if the couple died in a suicide pact.
sentences.cn: 警察拒绝回答这对夫妇是否是一起自杀的。

sentences.en: The trade pact between those two countries came to an end.
sentences.cn: 那两国的通商协定宣告结束.

sentences.en: The voters may be ready to punish the politicians who devised a faint-hearted solidarity pact.
sentences.cn: 选民们也许已经作好准备，去惩罚那些制订了懦弱的团结协定的政客。

sentences.en: They have made a pact with each other not to speak about their differences in public.
sentences.cn: 他们彼此达成协议，不公开谈论他们的歧见。

sentences.en: They made a pact not to tell anyone.
sentences.cn: 他们有协定,不告诉任何人.

sentences.en: This is a pact between us.
sentences.cn: 这就是你我之间的公约.

sentences.en: This led to a non - aggression pact between the two countries.
sentences.cn: 这导致了两国间互不侵犯协议的签订.

sentences.en: This pact slowly erodes as members defect and outside demand gets more elastic.
sentences.cn: 随着成员国的背叛以及外部的需求变得更有弹性,这个协定就慢慢地失掉约束力.

sentences.en: We made a solemn pact to go to sea together.
sentences.cn: 我们郑重其事地约好,大家一起航海.

sentences.en: We will put military muscle into the mutual defence pact.
sentences.cn: 我们将把兵力加进防御互助条约.

trans.tran_en: a formal agreement between two groups, countries, or people, especially to help each other or to stop fighting
